title: Focus on Heroin
creator_credit: Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited, Avanti Films and American Educational Films
brief_description: This film points out the risks of being a heroin addict. Explains that addicts cannot be identified solely with one particular socio-economic level and cannot always be detected by appearance. Addicts and ex-addicts describe the first and subsequent drugs they used.
